name: Absorb Bulb
description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp.Atk if hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Adamant Orb
description: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when it is held.

name: Adrenaline Orb
description: If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated.

name: Air Balloon
description: The holder will float in the air until hit. Once hit, this item will burst.

name: Assault Vest
description: This offensive vest raises Sp.Def but prevents the use of status moves.

name: Big Root
description: It boosts the amount of HP the holder recovers from HP-stealing moves.

name: Binding Band
description: A band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

name: Black Belt
description: This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

name: Black Glasses
description: A pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

name: Black Sludge
description: It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.

name: Blunder Policy
description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

name: Bright Powder
description: It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon's accuracy.

name: Cell Battery
description: It boosts Attack if hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

name: Charcoal
description: It’s a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

name: Choice Band
description: This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

name: Choice Scarf
description: This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

name: Choice Specs
description: These curious glasses boost Sp.Atk but only allow the use of one move.

name: Damp Rock
description: It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

name: Dragon Fang
description: This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

name: Eject Button
description: If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

name: Eject Pack
description: Enables Pokémon with a lowered stat to switch out of battle.
